headline.print_headline: Pa. Craigslist Killing Suspect Says 2 Never Showed
headline.main: Pa. Craigslist Killing Suspect Says 2 Never Showed

docs.snippet: A woman charged along with her newlywed husband with killing a man she met through Craigslist tells a newspaper that two other men had responded to her ad for companionship but never showed up....
docs.lead_paragraph: A woman charged along with her newlywed husband with killing a man she met through Craigslist tells a newspaper that two other men had responded to her ad for companionship but never showed up.

headline.sub: Afghan women say peace key to their lives
headline.main: Afghan women say peace key to their lives

docs.snippet: Afghan women voters want peace and stability so they can defend the freedoms they've gained since the fall of the Taliban. Masako Iijima reports...
docs.lead_paragraph: Afghan women voters want peace and stability so they can defend the freedoms they've gained since the fall of the Taliban. Masako Iijima reports

headline.main: A Sperm Donor, Uncertain of What It Is to Be 'Bio-Dad'

docs.snippet: After a request from friends, a 29-year-old gay man explored the possibility of becoming a sperm donor....
docs.abstract: After a request from friends, a 29-year-old gay man explored the possibility of becoming a sperm donor.

headline.print_headline: Kerry Meets Lavrov on Ukraine, Urges Troop Pullback
headline.main: Kerry Meets Lavrov on Ukraine, Urges Troop Pullback

docs.snippet: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry and Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov held talks on Sunday about ways to defuse the crisis over Ukraine, with Kerry telling Moscow that progress depended on a Russian troop pullback from Ukraine's borders....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. Secretary of State John Kerry and Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov held talks on Sunday about ways to defuse the crisis over Ukraine, with Kerry telling Moscow that progress depended on a Russian troop pullback from Ukraine's borders.

headline.print_headline: 21 Killed in Shooting at Nigeria State Security HQ
headline.main: 21 Killed in Shooting at Nigeria State Security HQ

docs.snippet: A shootout at Nigeria's State Security Services headquarters near the presidential villa killed at least 21 people Sunday, a government spokeswoman said of what appears to be an attempted jailbreak by Islamic extremists....
docs.lead_paragraph: A shootout at Nigeria's State Security Services headquarters near the presidential villa killed at least 21 people Sunday, a government spokeswoman said of what appears to be an attempted jailbreak by Islamic extremists.

headline.sub: Chinese families of passengers on flight MH370 seek answers
headline.main: Chinese families of passengers on flight MH370 seek answers

docs.snippet: Relatives of passengers on board the missing Malaysia airlines jet vent their anger at officials after flying into Kuala Lumpur. Sarah Toms reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Relatives of passengers on board the missing Malaysia airlines jet vent their anger at officials after flying into Kuala Lumpur. Sarah Toms reports.

headline.print_headline: Lotus Re-emerges as F1 Points Contender
headline.main: Lotus Re-emerges as F1 Points Contender

docs.snippet: Lotus showed it is ready to be a regular Formula One points contender, as it shook off a dismal start to the season with an encouraging performance at Sunday's Malaysian Grand Prix....
docs.lead_paragraph: Lotus showed it is ready to be a regular Formula One points contender, as it shook off a dismal start to the season with an encouraging performance at Sunday's Malaysian Grand Prix.

headline.sub: Over 100,000 protest in Taiwan over China trade deal
headline.main: Over 100,000 protest in Taiwan over China trade deal

docs.snippet: More than 100,000 protesters took to the streets of Taiwan's capital on Sunday as a two-week-long campaign against a trade pact with China gathered steam, piling further pressure on the island's leader. Rough Cut (No Reporter Narration)....
docs.lead_paragraph: More than 100,000 protesters took to the streets of Taiwan's capital on Sunday as a two-week-long campaign against a trade pact with China gathered steam, piling further pressure on the island's leader. Rough Cut (No Reporter Narration).

headline.print_headline: Army Bus Ambushed in Egypt's Sinai, Soldier Killed
headline.main: Army Bus Ambushed in Egypt's Sinai, Soldier Killed

docs.snippet: Egyptian security officials say suspected militants have attacked a military bus carrying policemen in the restive Sinai Peninsula, killing the soldier driving it....
docs.lead_paragraph: Egyptian security officials say suspected militants have attacked a military bus carrying policemen in the restive Sinai Peninsula, killing the soldier driving it.

headline.print_headline: Six Killed in Clashes During Municipal Elections in Turkey
headline.main: Six Killed in Clashes During Municipal Elections in Turkey

docs.snippet: Six people were killed on Sunday in clashes between groups backing rival candidates in Turkey's municipal elections, which turned into a referendum on the rule of Prime Minister Tayyip Erdogan....
docs.lead_paragraph: Six people were killed on Sunday in clashes between groups backing rival candidates in Turkey's municipal elections, which turned into a referendum on the rule of Prime Minister Tayyip Erdogan.
